attributes.action: More money needs to be spent on teenage mental health provisions.
attributes.additional_details: Rates of depression and anxiety among teenagers have increased by 70% in the last 25 years. 75% of mental health illnesses emerge before 25 and only 50% of young people are getting any kind of care.
attributes.background: Conservatives have major cuts to teenage mental health provisions. They need our help! Teenagers’ everyday are suffering with mental health issues.
